main event: A civilian student observed a round object at Camp Poh-Tok, Maryland on June 27, 1955.
interesting points: The object appeared to be the size of a quarter held at arm's length., The object appeared white when stationary and red when moving., The object's size seemed to increase with apparent motion and color change., An AF jet a/o was plotted in the area at the time of the sighting., Thunderstorm conditions may have influenced the description of the sighting.
